name: Balls Versus Blocks
description:
Aim and Destroy as many blocks as you can! Try to get more balls to bounce back to you so you have a better shot at destroying more blocks!

To get more balls you have to direct your aim to shoot at the white balls spread within the number blocks, when you shoot a ball you will earn it and it will automatically join your next shot!

The more balls in your shot the more number blocks you can destroy!
